articles.title: Business confidence in Massachusetts drops again, report says
articles.description:
It’s the longest stretch of pessimism since the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020.

The post Business confidence in Massachusetts drops again, report says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Business confidence in Massachusetts declines for the longest stretch since 2020.
Recent report indicates a significant drop in optimism among local businesses.
Continued pessimism may affect job growth and economic recovery in Boston.

articles.title: Boston Legacy FC announce date of 2026 home opener
articles.description:
The club will take the field on March 14.

The post Boston Legacy FC announce date of 2026 home opener appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Legacy FC will host their 2026 home opener on March 14.
The match marks the club's second season in the league.
Local fans can expect increased community engagement and events leading up to the opener.
